website_summaries.verdict: Affordable option for a lightweight, mid-rise baseball cleat.
pros: Durable design is made with an abrasion resistant toe piece
0.75-inch midsole foam absorbs shock and provides a cushioned ride
Rotational traction increases speed and agility
Rubber molded cleat material keeps the overall weight light
cons: Some athletes found these shoes to be much wider than the average width of a baseball cleat

customer_reviews.title: We purchased these instead of the usual Nike because of there support of someone who promotes police hated and his love for Castro
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. My son uses them for football and loves the fit. We purchased these instead of the usual Nike because of there support of someone who promotes police hated and his love for Castro. Under armour is our new brand. Keep making great products and we are customers for life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: something that looked good, and was well made
customer_reviews.text: Use case: Casual Softball Overkill?: Probably. I wanted something to keep my ankles steady, something that looked good, and was well made. I got all of that in this product and can't complain abit, other than I look like I am a try-hard at casual beer league softball. Eh.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Sangster

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and my child says they feel great. Good price and quality for spring baseball
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Pouncey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and was exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and was exactly as described. The shoe was too small for my son but I believe it was due to my son growing and not a defect of the shoe. Would recommend to others and would have ordered it again but they did not have the next size up in stock.
customer_reviews.author: John Moline

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, 2-3 season cleats.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these baseball cleats, but they were much smaller than expected, so I returned them. I have never played in them, but a few people from my team have them, and they based on what I have seen, you should only expect to get a few season out of them before you noticed the wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Runs a half size small, normally I take an 11 but ordered 11.5 and they fit perfect. The only weird thing is the seller orders them from Foot Locker and resells them so if you return them it may be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Norton

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! Bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son, baseball season. He is in a 7 right now but I ordered 7.5 for wiggle room with socks on. They run narrow so if your kid has wide feet, no go. But other than that, they fit. Great quality, love the color (red).
customer_reviews.author: Haydee

customer_reviews.title: waterproof
customer_reviews.text: wet grass? no worries, everyone elses cleates were soaked, not mine. nice and dry. only complain is the tread on the bottom seems to wear faster than any cleat ive had. but i do run fast :)
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cleats for a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 13 and ordered a size 14 to play it safe and man these fit good and still had some room so it's not like if you order a 13 your getting a size 11 the size it accurate these are very comfy and has good padding that surrounds your feet overall these are a great but plus it is cheap so it makes it even better
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: UA all the way
customer_reviews.text: The Kid likes these. Bought another popular brand and his feet hurt through most of the season. No complaints about these baseball shoes
customer_reviews.author: Carl T

customer_reviews.title: Best to not be in a hurry...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint with this cleat is my own fault, I was late for softball the first night of owning these and didn't get left one on well. The fit is exactly what I want in an athletic shoe (snug) but the back of the shoe had rolled down a little with my foot and caused a blister. The next week, I loosened the laces a little more and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Ott

customer_reviews.title: Two weeks in and they still look pretty new.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! Two weeks in and they still look pretty new.
customer_reviews.author: Paula R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Girls, too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11 year old daughter who wears a size 9 women’s shoe. She loves high top cleats for playing softball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Very comfortable and fits relatively true to size. I usually wear an 11 so that’s what I went with. Tight at first but after breaking them in they fit well. The tread is perfect for grass and sand. The show itself protects well from debris and flying baseballs. Definitely a big fan of the high tops and padding. Overall great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: my son loves them
customer_reviews.text: my son loves these cleats. they seem to be comfortable for him and look like durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect service
customer_reviews.text: Great product, came in on time and it’s as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Danny Buezo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fair price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 18 yr old who plays on a team..what can I say, the next week others on the team came with the same ones. They're dirty now but were very cute when they came brand new :)Under Armour is proven quality and at a fair price the sizing is exactly right
customer_reviews.author: amreztruk

customer_reviews.text: Great price on a great quality product. The only con is that the shoe is extremely narrow and that should be disclosed in the description. Other than that, GREAT !
customer_reviews.author: Tyan

customer_reviews.title: Good softball shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are solid shoes that fit right and have good ankle support. They provide good traction both in the outfield and infield as well as running the bases. I play in two leagues with doubleheaders every Sat and Sun, and they have held up two seasons now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Savvy

customer_reviews.title: Consistently good quality with Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: Son is happy, mom is happy. Under Armour baseball shoes have always been a good choice for us.
customer_reviews.author: BGMommy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe and lightweight. Very narrow, which other reviews have stated. My son has very narrow feet so thought they would fit perfect but to narrow even for him.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Stritesky

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and works well in grass/mud and on turf
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect no complaints
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the shoes shes a 9 1/2 in womens so we ordered a 9 and fits perfect. Came a day before it was scheduled to arrive. Were very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dinazha

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Size is true. Comfortable and provide good support. Look great. Terrific price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: “Great Baseball Cleats”
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cleats.👍🏼 For the price you can’t do much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lenarz

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleats!
customer_reviews.text: These cleats look really good on my son, and HE likes them!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: YO

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These have held up very well - the best that I have used. I wear these to take dogs for a walk and they have held up great. They are used in the yard and also on pavement on a daily basis. Work great for when yards are muddy or it is raining.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Williams

customer_reviews.title: A solid buy
customer_reviews.text: Great cleats! It was hard to find a pair of good midtop cleats with rubber spikes. But these seem very well made and have been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Narrow show
customer_reviews.text: Great show good product but runs narrow. Show a little tight for my sons foot, know to buy a size up next time!
customer_reviews.author: Jayson and Misty Morris

customer_reviews.title: 10 yr old daughter loves!
customer_reviews.text: once i finally figured out the size, and ordered... the shoes are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfect, fedex delivered them 6 miles away and amazon was good to fix problem.
customer_reviews.author: kati t.

customer_reviews.title: They are a little snug
customer_reviews.text: I have played 3 men's soft ball games so far and they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: great cleats
customer_reviews.text: I needed something a little wider around the toe area and this fit well. they are very comfortable and give great support -- good buy
customer_reviews.author: M. Marshel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable out of the box. I've played nearly 100 games in them and they are still holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Feel Great to Use
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for softball for about 10 months now and they work and fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Surftheblue

customer_reviews.title: Son's bb cleats
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of 10 boys had similar bb cleats. Very popular. My son loves them and they fit as expected. They are a mid-top.
customer_reviews.author: T Trucks

customer_reviews.title: I love these cleats
customer_reviews.text: I love these cleats! They are comfortable and just what I was looking for in price. I always wear my running shoes and cleats a size larger than I would normally wear for the added foot moment and flex. I wear a size 11 and ordered a size 12 for this reason. They are not too big and still provide the support I was hoping for. I am thankful to have found these cleats on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and flexible, but runs a tad small. You may want to go 1/2 size up on these.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Shoe too small!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are too small. Never had my size be too small regardless of the shoe. Very disappointed. But thats what I get for buying shoes online! It won't happen again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves his new cleats!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new cleats. Thank you for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie G

customer_reviews.title: Sweet action!
customer_reviews.text: The boy is elated! They look awesome fit just right and that's all I can ask for! Here's to a home run!
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my little brother for baseball and can’t wait to see him use them this year
customer_reviews.author: Brach

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, leather wrinkled on first use. Now they look a year old already
customer_reviews.author: Moore Family

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cleats. My son loves them. They fit true to size and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the price. We will see how it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: brian bandstra

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. The cleats themselves seem to wear down quicker than other baseball shoes I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Rogan

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. My son loved them from the moment he put them on and started to run. He’s a catcher, so comfort is a plus for him behind the plate. Size is great with a little growing room.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wipf

customer_reviews.title: and has been useful for my recreational softball and flag football
customer_reviews.text: Solid, cheap, and has been useful for my recreational softball and flag football leagues
customer_reviews.author: Nick W

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I play with them for 3 weeks now and they still perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Willis A.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend them. Went back to my old pair
customer_reviews.text: Not very supportive of the foot. First time I wore them, I hurt my foot. Thin and light. I wouldn't recommend them. Went back to my old pair.
customer_reviews.author: Brumley

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: My son really loves these cleats! Fast shipping.. great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nim Eppers

customer_reviews.title: Narrow but overall good clear!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very narrow. Besides that it’s a great baseball cleat!
customer_reviews.author: Allan Hylton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfortable. I don't know how long they'll last, but for the price I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Dones

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good cleats, quality material and I think a steal for the price. Only thing is that I wear a size 13 with all my shoes and the size 13 cleats were a little snug but not that much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the style , did not like the size , little small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them
customer_reviews.text: Great pick up at price. Great for men’s soft ball leagues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fit and the look but the inside cushion could ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit and the look but the inside cushion could be a little bit softer.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat, too small
customer_reviews.text: the cleats were great, but too narrow & a bit small - returned
customer_reviews.author: Clare Ramery

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: comfortable, and great traction in the mud. best cleats i have had in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: micheal ballantyne

customer_reviews.title: Normally I wear size 11 but after reading other reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: Normally I wear size 11 but after reading other reviews about UA baseball shoes and taking to other players, I ordered a half size bigger, a wise choice.
customer_reviews.author: JHP

customer_reviews.title: Great feel right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't right reviews, but I put this pair on and they were very comfortable right out of the box. Usually my feet are sore for days, this wasn't the case with this pair of cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Spaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are a little small but they still fit fine and they feel great
customer_reviews.author: Allly Zauche

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleats.
customer_reviews.text: They are great my son loved them. He said he had the best pair of cleats on the team. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... tight fit out of the box but broke in nicely after 2 games
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fit out of the box but broke in nicely after 2 games
customer_reviews.author: Sackett

customer_reviews.title: Fit just right!!
customer_reviews.text: the fit of the cleats is perfect!! i was a little leary about ordering shoes online, but I'm glad i took a chance!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great. They fit my son really well and he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D'Amato

customer_reviews.title: they are very comfortable and fit great
customer_reviews.text: I've only broken them in so far, however, they are very comfortable and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeromy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice cleats. Looks very cool and its very confortable. Exceed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice spikes. Haven't yet had a chance to use them since it's winter.
customer_reviews.author: BC2403

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Speedform Gemini 3 Graphic Baseball Shoe
product_meta.description: Synthetic leather upper provides exceptional step-in comfort with added durability & support. Mesh tongue adds enhanced breathability to keep feet cool & dry all game long. Full-length EVA midsole for added comfort, cushioning & help dispersing cleat pressure. Rubber Molded cleats provide optimal traction & durability for all field surfaces. Weight: 13 oz.
feature_bullets: Synthetic leather upper provides exceptional step in comfort with added durability & support
Mesh tongue adds enhanced breathability to keep feet cool & dry all game long
Full length EVA midsole for added comfort, cushioning & help dispersing cleat pressure
Rubber Molded cleats provide optimal traction & durability for all field surfaces
